titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab: 1817, Jan. 1. W. Mandeville, p. 4. M calls: K Colnet dines.

2. Th. Mandeville, p. 5. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. M dines. Slight access of disease: vehemently impassioned dream; imprecation.
3. F. Write to Hepburn . Constable calls n : dine at Curran’s , w. Meyler .

4. Sa. Mandeville, 1 page. Call on Dolman
&
H Robinson
.

Jan. 5. Su. Mandeville, p. 7. Write to Constable . Dine at Stewart’s , w. J Taylor, Narrien, Holmes, Robinson & Pinfold; adv. Lucas & Meyler , & concert . Constable n & son call, & Jo G . H Ht, 3 nights.

6. M. Mandeville, p. 8. Call on Hume
: dine at Curran’s , w. Banks .

7. Tu. Mandeville, p. 10/2. M, F Ht & Clarkes dine:
Rodd’s
.

8. W. Mandeville, p. 10. P B S calls: call on Haywd
.

9. Th. Mandeville, p. 11. Destruction of Troy, p. 40. Write to Curtis . P B S dines: call on Dolman
: theatre, Broken Sword.
10. F. Mandeville, p. 12/2. Dine at Curran’s , w. Meyler .
11. Sa. My Landlord, p. 96. Shelley dines: Botwright calls.
Jan. 12. Su. Mandeville, p. 13/2. My Landlord, p. 361; Vol. II, p. 120.
13. M. Mandeville, p. 14/2. My Landlord, p. 340; Vol. III, p. 72. P B S at tea. De Montfort, act 1.

14. Tu. Mandeville, 6 lines, &c. My Landlord, p. 255. P B S dines: call on Sherwood
: meet Phillips & D Constable :
Rodd’s ; adv. Triphook
.

15. W. Mandeville, p. 15. My Landlord, p. 349, & Vol. IV.
Whitaker (St Pauls)
, & Fk na call.
16. Th. Mandeville, p. 17/2. Sterline, Aurora, çala. Write to Curtis . Botwright calls.

17. F. Mandeville, p. 19/2. Aurora, çala. D Constable sups. Call on Hume
:
Rodd’s
.

18. Sa. Mandeville, p. 2 1/2. Call on Longman
, &
Whitaker, St Pauls
n :
theatre, w. M J & W, Humorous Lieutenant .

Jan. 19. Su. Mandeville, p. 22. Humorous Lieut, acts 1 & 2. Call on Aldis , w. W G; adv. Woodham
.
20. M. Mandeville, p. 24/2. Write to Constable . P B S & Botwright call n : dine at Curran’s , w. Meyler .

21. Tu. Mandeville, p. 24. Write to Curran . Call on Hayward
: sup at Lamb’s , w. Pl. Lloyd .
22. W. Meyler, çala. Write to P B S . Theatre, Oronoko: R & E Taylor, & D Constable sup.

23. Th. Mandeville, p. 26. Call on Hardwick
n : Botwright at tea.

24. F. Call on Davison
n &
P B S (Vale of Health)
n : Davison calls n :
Rodd’s
. Fk & Botwright at tea.
25. Sa. Mandeville, p. 28. M calls. Theatre, 1/2 Know your own Mind.

Jan. 26. Su. Mandeville, p. 29. Dine at Hunt’s , w. Shelley, Hazlit, Colson & Hogg :
P B S & M sup & sleep.

27. M. Mandeville, p. 31. Dine at Curran’s
.

28. Tu. Mandeville, p. 32. Call on Hume
:
Shelleys dine, & sleep, 2 nights. Parliament meets.

30. Th. Call, w. P B S, on Brougham
, &
Wetherel ; adv. Longdil
: call on Place
. William to school. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. M calls.
31. F. Mandeville, p. 34. P B S & L Hunt call: consultation; Brougham, B M , Wetherel, Horne, Longdil, L H & P B S : M calls: Fk dines.
Feb. 1. Sa. Mandeville, p. 36. Dine at Curran’s , w. Shiel & Wallace : Hunts at tea: Shelleys sleep, 2 nights.
Feb. 2. Su. Mandeville, p. 37.
3. M. Mandeville, p. 38. Botwright , M Jones & D Constable call: Philips & P P dine:
4. Tu. Mandeville, p. 40. Botwright calls: Shelleys, 3 Hunts & P P dine. Write to Constable .

5. W. Mandeville, p. 42/2. Kenney dines:
theatre, w. Kenney; Ravens : Green Room, D L, w Kenny; Kean, Rae, Lamb, Linley, De Camp, & mrs Alsop : sup at S E’s , w. M J .

6. Th. Call on Brougham
,
Mackintosh
,
Rogers
,
Longdill
, &
M Burney
n :
Shelleys dine & sleep.

7. F. Mandeville, p. 42. M Burney & M call: Shelleys dine:
Rodd’s
.
8. Sa. Mandeville, p. 43. Shelley & Hunt call, & Sir R P .

Feb. 9. Su. Mandeville, p. 45/2. Call on Jeffery ; adv. Brougham
: Kenney sups. Mourning .

10. M. Mandeville, p. 46.
Shelleys dine & sleep. Lambs call, R Taylor , & T T na . Write to Lamb .

11. Tu. Mandeville, p. 47. Shelleys, L Hunt & m Kent dine:
theatre, w. them, Shylock; adv. M Lamb
.

12. W. Mandeville, p. 49. Shelley dines; adv. Botwright
. Booth appears in Richard.

13. Th. Mandeville, p. 50. Theatre, R. III (Booth); adv. Perry & J Taylor
.

14. Sa.
Mandeville, p. 52. Curran calls:
Rodd’s
.

15. Sa. Mandeville, p. 54/2. Shelley dines: sup at
Wolcot’s , w. J Taylor . meet A Boswell .

Feb. 16. Su. Mandeville, p. 55. Dine at L Hunt’s , w. Shelleys, Hazlits & B Montagu; adv. Colson, Gatty & Clarke
.
17. M. Mandeville, p. 56. Seek Evans : theatre, 3/5 Hamlet: Owen calls n .

18. Tu. Mandeville, 2 pp. Call on Evans
n &
Banks
n : dine at Curran’s
.

19. W. Write to Taylor (Norwich)
, &
Hewlet. Herne Hill
; meet Evans : Mary, Jane & W dine.

20. Th. Mandeville, 1 page. Genii, çala. Dibbin calls: P B S, Hunts & P P dine:
theatre, Othello (Booth); adv. Perry, Bentleys & miss Lunan
.
21. F. Mandeville, p. 59/2. Genii, p. 43. Shelley & P P dine.

22. Sa. Mandeville, p. 60. Write to P H G . Genii, p. 55. Curran calls: P P dines:
Rodd’s
.
Feb. 23. Su. Mandeville, p. 61. Genii, p. 76. M calls: 4 Shelleys dine: Kenney & H R sup.

24. M. Mandeville, p. 63/2. Chapman, Cæsar, acts 1, 2, 3. Dine at
Curran’s
.

25. Tu. Mandeville, p. 65/2. Call on Harlowe
&
Northcote
: Owen calls: dine at
Rogers’s , w. Curran, Este & H Rogers .

26. W. Mandeville, p. 67/2. Call on Northcote
: Kenney dines; adv. P B S
.

27. Th. Mandeville, p. 67. Write to J Booth . Wanderer, by C K. Call on
Hume
: theatre, 3/5 J Shore. M & W G S call, ppc: call on Poole
n .

28. F. Mandeville, p. 68. Write to Constable . Call on Inchbald
: meet Gawler : dine at Curran’s , w. Meyler & Lubey .

Mar. 1. Sa. Mandeville, p. 72/2. Call on Cadel, Ed.
: Owen & Botwright call:
Rodd’s
: theatre, Booth, & Heir of Vironi; adv. Cadel & Knowles
.
Mar. 2. Su. Mandeville, p. 74. Dine at Stewart’s , w. Owen, Holmes, Robinson, & (?) Pinfold: concert .

3. M. Mandeville, 2 pp. M & M Jones call: theatre Booth, Richard; adv. Knowles’s
.

4. Tu. Mandeville, 1 1/2 pp. M & P B S call: dine at
Curran’s , w. Lubey, Meyler & Waring junr
. Chapman, Cæsar, fin.

5. W. Mandeville, p. 76. Write to Wedgwood, on M
. Lubey calls: C & M Colnet dine.

6. Th. Mandeville, 4 lines. Sophi, çala: write to Townsend on do
: M calls.

7. F. Mandeville, p. 77. Museum; Harris’s Voyages . Meet R Cadell :
Rodd’s
.
8. Sa. Mandeville, 8 lines. Write to P B S . Cadel calls: theatre, Booth, Overeach.
Mar. 9. Su. Mandeville, p. 78. Ralegh, çala. Jo G calls.
10. M. Mandeville, p. 80. Theatre, Manuel (adv. Hamond ): M calls: Botwright sups.

11. Tu. Mandeville, p. 83/2. Call at Dulau
: sup at S E’s , w. M J & Leserve ; sleep. meet Raymond : Kenney calls n .

12. W.
Execution of Cashman
. De Retz, çala. Collins’s dine; adv. L C
: Ritchie & W Curran call.
13. Th. Mandeville, p. 85/2. Museum; Maryland .

14. F. Mandeville, p. 87. Kenney dines; adv. Ritchie
: M calls.

15. Sa. Mandeville, p. 89/2{.} M calls: theatre, Cymbeline; adv. Hume
: call on Knowles
.
Mar. 16. Su. Camberwel. W Curran & Lubey dine.

17. M. Mandeville, p. 89. Call on Bertram
: M dines:
Rodd’s
. Write to Shelley .

18. Tu. Invent Holloway. Mandeville, p. 90. Write to Constable . Dine at Brom
Curran’s , w. Lubey .

19. F.
Mandeville, p. 93. Melincourt, Vol. I.
W Curran & M call.

20. Th. Mandeville, p. 95. Melincourt, Vol. II.
Miss Collins dines, & theatre, w. M J & Clarkes
. Write to Shelley .

21. F. Mandeville, p. 98. J Parry calls: call on
Hayward
: dine at Curran’s , w. Ball (from Rome), & Lubey .

22. Sa. Mandeville, p. 101/2. Call on Saunders
: theatre, 1/2 Kean, Overreach. Write to J J G . Meet Tho. H[ild?] .

Mar. 23. Su. Mandeville, p. 103/2. Melincourt, Vol. III. M calls: call on
Lamb
n .

24. M. Mandeville, p. 105/2: M dines:
Rodd’s
.
25. Tu. Mandeville, p. 107. Write to Shelley & L Hunt . M (from Pike ) & Botwright call.
26. W. Mandeville, p. 110/2. Lamb calls: seek Kernot : meet Boaden & Morton : miss Collins & M dine.

27. Th. Mandeville, p. 112. Call on Kernot
: Kenney dines:
theatre, w. do , Curfew . meet Hewlet .

28. F. Mandeville, p. 114. M calls: call on
Davison
: Shelley dines.

29. Sa. Mandeville, p. 116/2. Write to Constable . Call on Kernot
: British Gallery : dine at Curran’s , w. Shiel, Wallace, Quin & Lubé .

Mar. 30. Su. Mandeville, p. 117. Markland, çala. Call on Hayward
.
31. M. Headlong Hall, pp. 217. J B Curran calls: Lamb, M Burney, Kenney & Alsager sup.

Apr. 1. Tu. Mandeville, revise. Mrs Cecil Smith & M dine; adv. Kenney & 2 Mrs Napiers
.

2. W. Mandeville, revise. Coach for Marlow, w. naval officer & mother : tea Shelley’s ; adv. Peacock
.

3. Th.
Medmenham Abbey, by water, w. Peacock, P B S, M & J . W G at home.

4. F.
Bisham Wood, w. P B S; adv. Peacock ; talk of novels, & perfectibility . Curran calls n .

5. Sa.
Hurley, by water, w. P B S & Peacock . J B Curran calls n .

Mar Apr. 6. Su.
Maidenhead, by water, w. P B S, & M & Peacock : coach: dine in S S, 6 o’clock.

7. M.
M breakfasts: call on Kernot
:
Rodd’s
.

8. Tu. Mandeville, revise. Call on Maud , for M
, & on
Bartrum
n , &
Kernot ; adv. Whyte
:
Buchanan’s , w. do
: Kenney at tea: do & Alsager sup; adv invités Lamb & M Burney
.

9. W. Mandeville, revise. Write to Mary . // Amadis, p. 96. Call on Bartrum
n &
Hayward
: invité Curran’s, w. Kenney : Graham of Glasgow calls.

10. Th. Mandeville, revise. Call on Bartrum
&
Poole
: S E dines; adv. Kenney ; invités H Ht
.

11. F. Mandeville, 1/2 page; revise; invent. Hayward , Curran & Banks call:
theatre, w. Kenney & W, Iron Chest (Booth); adv. Shiell & Wallace
. Giddiness.

12. Sa. Gildon, Two Stages, pp. 200. A Boswell calls na :
Rodd’s
.

Apr. 13. Su. Mandeville, 1/2 page. Farquhar on Comedy, pp. 27. Jo G calls: dine at
S E’s , w. M J & W .

14. M. Mandeville, revise. Amadis, p. 168: Hall, çala. Call on Lawrence
: Lubé calls n . W G to school.

15. Tu. Mandeville, Vol. III, p. 2. Write to Shelley . Call on Northcote
: theatre, Conquest of Tarranto; adv. Ryan
.
16. W. Mandeville, proofs. Write to Constable . Hall, characters, çala.
17. Th. Letter to P B S, 4 pages. Fenwick calls: theatre, Elphi Bey.

18. F. Write to P B S . Call on Kernot
&
Hayward
: Mt & Caroline Colnet dine.

19. Sa. Mandeville, p. 3. Call on Boswell
n : meet Moore , Perry , J Taylor & Hill : theatre, Gamester.

Apr. 20. Su. Mandeville, p. 4. Meet J B Curran : dine at Curran’s , w. Shiel, Wallace, Quin & Finnerty; adv. Ryan & Glyn
.

21. M. Write to P B S . Kenney dines; adv. L Eastwick
: theatre, D L, w. Kenney ; see Munden, Kean , Oxberry, &c .

22. Tu. Mandeville, p. 6. Write to P B S, 16 lines. Call on Major
,
Longman
,
Sherwood
&
Hunter
: Kenney at tea n : theatre, Double Gallant.

23. W. Mandeville, p. 8/2. Sup at Lamb’s
.

24. Th. Mandeville, 1/2 page. Beagin calls: call on Kernot
n : Kenney dines: meet M Burney .
25. F. Write to P B S .

26. Sa. Seneca, De Ira, c. 4. Call on Kernot (adv. Wall ) &
S E
: tea Wolcot’s , w. J Taylor .

Apr. 27. Su. Mandeville, 1/2 page. Oracles of Reason, çala. S E calls: call on
Hayward
.

28. M. Mandeville, 10 lines. Indisposed. Kenney dines: call on
Jo G
, &
Kernot ; adv. Wall
. Irritation.

29. Tu. Proofs. Write to
Taylor (Norwich)
& Shelley . Call on Hume
:
Rodd’s
.

30. W. Mandeville, p. 9. Write to Shelley, 1 page.
Botwright calls n : H Robinson sups.

May 1. Th.
Hayward & Wall n call: call on Hayward
.

2. F.
Wall calls: call on Hayward
: Ogilvie (Am.) calls: Kenney at tea. Banks calls n .

3. Sa. Mandeville, p. 10. Ogilvie & Hayward call. Miss Collins dines:
theatre, Apostate, w. Collins, C Colnet, M J & W; adv. O Brien & Wallace
. W G at home, 2 nights.
sleeps 2 nights . & Hazlit
.
May 4. Su. Mandeville, p. 12/2. Ogilvie, çala. Ogilvie dines: Kenney at tea.

5. M. Mandeville, p. 12. Call on Knowles
&
Hume
: Exhibition, w. M J, W, C C & D C; adv. Hill, Perry, Phillips, Liston, Ritchie, Imray & Miller
: Jo G , Ritchie & Hayward call: meet Morgan of Calne
.

6. Tu. Call on Ogilvie
n ,
J Taylor
n ,
Grattan
n &
Mackintosh
: dine at Curran’s
.
7. W. Mandeville, çala. Ogilvie & Hayward call: Kenney at tea.

8. Th. Mandeville, p. 13. M J for France . Ogilvie calls: dine at
Curran’s , w. Thomson, Meyler & Finnerty .

9. F. Mandeville, p. 15/2. Spira, pp. 75. Shiel & Botwright call: call on Hayward
: Ogilvie sups. Write to Shelley .

10. Sa. Write to M & daughter . Dr Miller calls:
Kenney dines: Opera, Don Giovanni.

May 11. Su. Mandeville, p. 16/2. Zaire, actes 1 & 2. Call on
Place
: Kenney dines: Ogilvie sups. meet Perry .

12. M. Write to Shelley & Baxter . East-India Chambers ; meet Turnbull & Elston :
Rodd’s
: Hazlit sups. Write to Poole . Percy calls na .

13. Tu. Mandeville, p. 17/2. Zaire, acte 3. Call on J Taylor
(adv. Dr Thornton) ,
Percy (w. Ogilvie) &
Hayward
.

14. W. Write to M J & M . Grattan , Owen & Percy call: call on Turnbull , w. Elston , & on
Hayward
n .

15. Th. Shelves. Turnbull calls: call on
Hayward
: Shiel & Ogilvie dine:
theatre (orchestra), w. Shiel; Cato; adv. Harlowe
.

16. F. Rhume. G Dyer calls: call on Hayward
&
Turnbull
:
Rodd’s
.

17. Sa. Write to M . Percy calls: dine at
Curran’s , w. Ogilvie, Thomson, Finnerty & Wallace; adv. Power ; invité Casey
.
May 18. Su. Mandeville, p. 18/2. Haimatoff, p. 82.

19. M. Mandeville, p. 19/2. Write to J Taylor . Haimatoff, p. 236, fin. Turnbull calls: meet do , at Christie’s
: call on Hayward
.

20. Tu. Mandeville, p. 20. Call on Hayward, for Christie’s
: meet J Taylor : call on Northcote
: dine at Curran’s
: Ogilvie calls n .

21. W. Mandeville, p. 21/2. Ferd. Jeronimi, çala. Percy calls: theatre, Hamlet, J P K; adv. Este
.

22. Th. Mandeville, p. 21. Write to M J . Ogilvie calls: call on Hayward
. Warton on Spenser, çala.

23. F. Mandeville, p. 22. Percy calls: Shelleys dine: call on Picart
n &
Hazlit
: dine at Curran’s ; adv. Hazlit & Ryan
. they sleep.
24. Sa. Mandeville, p. 23/2. Hazlit & Botwright call: meet Colson & Horace Smith : walk, w. Ogilvie & Shelley . Picart calls.

May 25. Su. Mandeville, p. 23. Call on Hayward
: seek C Hill : Ogilvie & Hog dine; adv. Hazlit ; invité Colson
.

26. M. Per Write to Longdil . Percy calls: call on S E
: Shelley departs. Anderson (Pershore) calls.

27. Tu. Mandeville, p. 24. Gulliver, p. 69. Call on Hayward
:
theatre, w. M W S, Barbarossa . Write to M J & E Fenwick . Hardwick calls n .

28. W. Mandeville, p. 25. Call on Sir Jos. Banks
: meet Turnbull : call on do
: sup at Wolcot’s , w. Hazlit . Ogilvie calls.
29. Th. Hazlit, on Shakespear, çala. Jo G calls: meet Turnbull : British Gallery, Deceased British Artists: dine at Curran’s , w. Hazlit : meet M & Percy .

30. F.
M & Turnbull call: sup at Lamb’s , w. M W S . call on Hume
.

31. Sa. Mandeville, p. 26. E & C Hill , Ogilvie & Hazlit call: Botwright & M dine:
Rodd’s
. M W S departs.

June 1. Su. Call on Evans, Dulwich
: dine at Stewart’s , w. Ogilvie, J Taylor, Holmes & Pinfold; adv. Owen & Robinson
: call on Turnbull
.
2. M. Write to M J . Quarterly, çala. Fenwick , Ogilvie & Verplank call: dine at Curran’s , w. Hazlit .

3. Tu. Call on Thornton
: Exhibition: Underwood sups. Gulliver, p. 125.
4. W. Mandeville, 12 lines. Write to Curtis . Gulliver, p. 223: Edgworth, Dramas. Ogilvie, Verplank, Hazlit & Coulson sup.

5. Th. Gulliver, p. 264. Call on Aldis
n : Trial of Wooler .

6. F. Write to M W S . Call on Thornton
n &
Hume
: meet Turnbull ; write to do
: M dines. Fire at Cromwel’s .

7. Sa. Mandeville, p. 27. Write to Wedgwood . Seek Davison : Curran calls: dine at
Curran’s , w. Quin . Verplank calls n .

June. 8. Su. Mandeville, p. 28. Write to Tho. Cooper . Hogg & Verplank call: Ogilvie sups. Call on
Hayward
.

9. M. Call on Thornton
,
Jo G
,
Dowling
&
M
. Trial of Watson, senior, 7 days.

10. Tu. Mandeville, p. 29. Curran calls:
Rodd’s
.

11. W. Mandeville, p. 31. Call on Davison
: M dines: sup at Ogilvie’s , w. Verplank & Bevan; adv. Payne
.

12. Th. Mandeville, p. 32. Write to Constable . Dine at Curran’s
.

13. F.
Ogilvie & Botwright call.
14. Sa. Write to Shelley . Meet Curran , Manning & Hill : sup at Hazlit , w. Lambs, Ogilvie, Coulson, Black & Alsager. & H White .

Su. June 15. Write to Evans . Verplank calls n : dine at Aldis’s , w. Powys & Downes; adv. miss Hill
.

16. M.
Ogilvie & Verplank call, for Ms : call on Jo G
: meet J Taylor , Hazlit , Place , Hayward , Mills & Hardy : call on R Taylor
n; adv. pere
.
Watson acquitted.

17. Tu. Write to M J . Manfred, L B.
Lamb , Taylor pere , Anderson & Ogilvie call: call on Hume
: M dines: H Robinson au soir.
18. W. Mandeville, p. 33. Write to Shelley & S Hamilton . Wall calls: Waterloo Fair. Hot weather, 8 days.

19. Th. Mandeville, p. 34. Write to Swartwoul & A Cooper . J B Curran calls: dine at
Curran’s
.

20. F. Mandeville, p. 36/2. J B Curran calls: dine at Curran’s Seek Davison : call on Alsager
: Lambs, Alsager & H White sup. Ogilvie calls.
21. Sa. Mandeville, p. 37. Write to Mrs Pilcher & Franklin . Wall calls. Blackwel on Homer, p. 70.

June 22. Su. Mandeville, p. 39. Ludlow, p. 58. Call on Ogilvie
.

23. M. Mandeville, p. 41. Blackwel, p. 133. Write to Thornton . Wall calls: call on Hayward
: dine at Curran’s , w. Stephens and Jennings : meet Finnerty .

24. Tu. Mandeville, p. 42. Lalla Rookh, p. 49. Call on Sherwood
&
Lamb
: meet Perry . William at home.

25. W. Lalla Rookh, p. 132. Ogilvie calls: call on Hayward
n &
Lamb
: dine at Curran’s
: M dines n : S E calls n .

26. Th. Mandeville, p. 43. Shelley dines; adv. Ogilvie
:
theatre (Talma, &c), w. Ogilvie & Ogden; adv. Payne, Wallace, O’Brien & Crowley
. Lalla Rookh, p. 198.

27. F. Mandeville, p. 44/2. Write to Mary . M calls: call on
R Taylor & pere
. Lalla Rookh, p. 294.

28. Sa. Mandeville, p. 46/2. Curran , Ogilvie & Hazlit call: dine at
Curran’s
: Lecture, w. Curran & Dixon; adv. J Taylor, Owen, Payne, Ogden, Bolland, & W G & Verplank
:
sup
. Lalla Rookh, p. 345, fin. Meet Shelley . Alston

June 29. Su. Mandeville, p. 47. Call on Place
, &
Aldis ; adv. Woodhouse & miss Hill
: Tieck & H Robinson sup.

30. M. Mandeville, p. 48. Write to Shelley & L Mayor . Jo G calls: call on
Hayward
n .

July 1. Tu. Mandeville, p. 49. Call on Harlow
:
Rodd’s ; adv. H White
. Hayward calls.
2. W. Mandeville, p. 50. Write to Shelley . Lusiad, C. I. Jo G & Wall call: M dines.
3. Th. Mandeville, p. 51. Lusiad, C. II, III. Botwright at tea: S E calls.

4. F. Lusiad, C. IV. Write to Curtis & Shelley . Call on Hayward
: Mulready, Harlow, Payne & Poole dine; adv. Hazlit ; invités Northcote, L Hunt & Ogilvie
. Jo G , Percy & Payne call, & Wall na .
5. Sa. Write to Shelley . Harrington (Edgw.), p. 197. Sup at Payne’s , w. Talma, West, Ogilvie, Hunter, Jordan, 2 Crowleys & Poole . M Jones calls.

July 6. Su. Mandeville, 1 page. Harrington, p. 521, fin; Ormond, p. 104.
Hayward calls.

7. M. Ormond, p. 300. M calls &
Ogilvie : dine at Curran’s
: call, w. do , on Thompson : H Robinson au soir.

8. Tu. Write to Shelley . Ormond, p. 422; Vol. III, p. 100. Jo G calls: seek Davison & Hill : call on Dennet, bond .
Taylor (Norwich) calls.
Ponsonby dies .

9. W. Write to M J . Ormond, p. 172. Call on
Davison
: Ogilvie calls: call on Longdil (on Tilson ) &
Northcote
: dine at Curran’s , w. Thompson & Treasures .

10. Th. Mandeville, p. 53/2. Write to Shelley . Ormond, p. 352, fin. Call on
Jo G
,
Lord Mayor
&
Hayward
: 3 Taylors sup.

11. F. Romance of Real Life, Vol. I. M breakfasts: call on
Hayward
&
R Miller
: Rosser, junr , calls.

12. Sa. Mandeville, revise. Romance, Vol. II. Curran calls, ppc; with him, Waterloo Bridge : call on Hayward
:
Ogilvie’s , w. W G; adv. Payne, S Hazlit, Hyams, & 3 Taylors
: Ogilvie sups.
Prorogation
.
July 13. Su. Schlegel, p. 29: Romance, Vol. III. Tieck & Hayward call (bonne nouvelle).

14. M. Schlegel, p. 62. Wall , Jo G , & Rosser, jr , call; M dines:
theatre, w. W G, Othello .

15. Tu. Mandeville, revise. Write to Shelley . Jo G calls:
Rodd’s
.
Me Stael dies .

16. W. Mandeville, revise. Write to M J . Coleridge, çala. Call on
Stoddart
: Tieck au soir. Rosser, junr , calls.
17. Th. Mandeville, revise. Write to Curtis . Coleridge, çala.
18. F. Mandeville, 1/2 page; revise, Coleridge, çala. meet Wall : M dines: Jo G calls. M J at home.
19. Sa. Coleridge, çala. No Lecture.

July 20. Su. Coleridge, çala. Call on Ogilvie
: S E calls.

21. M. Mandeville, p. 54/2. M calls n : S E dines: Botwright sups:
Rodd’s
.

22. Tu. Mandeville, p. 55/2. Write to Shelley & J J G . Jo G , J Taylor senr
& Ogilvie call: call on Hume
,
Hayward
&
Rodd
: M dines: 3 Taylors sup. Schlegel, p. 137.

23. W. Mandeville, 6 lines. Write to Shelley. Schlegel, p. 231. Call on Longdil
&
Hayward
: Sotheby & H Payne n call, & Botwright .

24. Th. Mandeville, p. 57/2. Write to Burney & Shelley . Schlegel, p Call on H Payne ; adv. Belchambers
: seek Hardy :
Rodd’s
.
25. F. Mandeville, p. 58. Schellegel, p. 317. Seek Davison .

26. Sa. Mandeville, p. 60/2. Write to Shelley . Schlegel, p. 347. Meet Longdill : M & Baxter n call:
Ogilvie’s , w. M J & W; adv. Payne & Rosser
.
July 27. Su. Mandeville, 61/2. Schlegel, p. 391. Ogilvie & H Payne dine.
28. M. Mandeville, p. 61. Write to Shelley . Schlegel, Vol. II, p. 94. Jo G calls, & G Dyer .

29. Tu. Mandeville, p. 63/2. Schlegel, p. 144. Meet Perry : Baxter at tea: meet H Payne .
Rodd’s
.

30. W. Mandeville, p. 64. Urania, p. 13: Schlegel, p. 182. Payne & Ogilvie call:
theatre, w. M J & W; Teasing Made Easy .
31. Th. Mandeville, p. 67/2. Urania, p. 20: Schlegel, p. 268.

Aug. 1. F. Mandeville, p: 68. Urania, p. 31: Schlegel, p. 390, fin.
Jo G calls: call on
do
. Mes Napier & Joyce call na .

2. Sa. Write to Shelley . Urania, p. 40; Davila, çala. Dine at Dyer’s , w. Macnally :
Ogilvie’s , w. M J, W & D C; adv. Payne & S Hazlit
.

Aug. 3. Su. Mandeville, p. 70/2. Davila, çala. Jo G breakfasts: call on Place
nit : Ogilvie sups. H Ht, 2 nights.

4. M. Mandeville, p. 71. Davila, çala: Genlis, Zuma, &c, p. 93.
M calls:
Rodd’s
. J J G for America .

5. Tu. Mandeville, invent. Davila, çala.
Roger O’Connor acquitted.
6. W. Mandeville, p. 73/2. Werter, p. 78. Baxter calls n , & Ogilvie n .

7. Th. Mandeville, p. 74/2. Atheist, acts 1 & 2. Call on
Davison
: miss Collins dines: Ogilvie sups. W to school. Hewlings, passim.
8. F. Mandeville, p. 75. Write to Place . Liberal Lover, pp. 69. M calls: Napier dines.

9. Sa. Mandeville, p. 77. Write to Shelley & Constable . Hazlit, çala. Jo G calls: call on
H G
.
Aug. 10. Su. Mandeville, p. 79. Rachel, pp. 153.

11. M. Mandeville, p. 80. Oroonoko, p. 68. Ogilvie & Hazlit call; call on Jo G
:
Rodd’s
.

12. Tu. Mandeville, p. 82. Oroonoko, p. 103, fin. Lubé calls na : call on Hume
: Botwright at tea.

13. W. Mandeville, p. 84/2. Write to Shelley . Call on Hayward
: meet Bonnycastle : Baxter sups.

14. Th. Mandeville, p. 86/2. Zulpha. Call on Sherwood
: M calls: theatre; Teasing made Easy, & Actor of all Work; adv. Hill
.

15. F. Mandeville, p. 87/2. Cecilia, çala. Leonardo da vinci; adv. Jas Moore
: call on Hume
: Fk dines.
16. Sa. Mandeville, p. 89/2. Cecilia, çala.

Aug. 17. Su. Mandeville, çala p. 90/2. Cecilia, çala.
Kenney breakfasts, dines & sleeps.
18. M. Mandeville, p. 32/2. Smollet, Travels, Vol. I. Jo G & M call.

19. Tu. Mandeville, transcribe, &c. Atheist, fin. Kenney calls:
Rodd’s ; adv. Rhodes
. Call on H Payne
.
20. W. Mandeville, p. 93. Greenwich . S E dines n : Merveilleux at tea na : Fk & Rosser na call. Write to Shelley .

21. Th. Mandeville, p. 94/2. Montorio, Vol. I. Lamb calls: call on
Northcote
.
22. F. Mandeville, p. 95/2. Steel-Glass, pp. 37: Montorio, Vol. II, p. 94. Meet Baugh Allen : Baxter sups.

23. Sa. Mandeville, p. 97/2. Philumene: Montorio, p. 162. Write to Constable . Kenney sups: M calls:
Rodds
.
Aug. 17 24. Su. Mandeville, p. 98/2. Montorio, p. 406. Kenney dines: Rosser au soir.

25. M. Mandeville, p. 99. Montorio, p. 518; Vol. III, p. 106. Call on Hayward
: Lambs & Kenney sup.
26. Tu. Mandeville, 3 lines. Montorio, p. 493, fin. Ogilvie calls: Botwright at tea.

27. W. Mandeville, p. 97. Write to Taylor, on Thurgar . Fable of the Bees, çala. Botwright & Ogilvie call: call on H G
(adv. P G) &
Jo G
. D Clarke departs.

28. Th. Write to P H G . Museum; speak to Ellis
: seek Douse : Kenney sups:
Rodd’s
.
29. F. Wild Irish Boy, p. 54. Ogilvie calls.
30. Sa. Mandeville, p. 98. Write to Wedgwood . Irish Boy, p. 178. Botwright & Kenney call.
Aug. 31. Su. Mandeville, 16 lines. Urania, p. 48: Irish Boy, p. 276; Vol. II, p. 126.

Sep. 1. M. Irish Boy, p. 342; Vol. III, p. 82. B Museum : call on Berthoud
&
De Boffe , &c (for
balafré
), &
Northcote
; adv. E Cowper .

2. Tu. Mandeville, p. 99/2. Irish Boy, p. 204: Urania, p. 64. Call on Schultz
: seek Blois :
Rodd’s
. W Curran calls na & M n . Invent. Mr Alexander .

3. W. Mandeville, p. 97, 98/2. Philaster, çala: Irish Boy, p. 264. Call on Blois
: Ellen Brown , Kenney & M call. Sick, au soir.
4. Th. Mandeville, p. 98. Irish Boy, p. 406, fin. B Museum; Menage : W Curran & R Taylor sup. Owen calls.
5. F. Mandeville, p. 99. Museum; Pasquier & Du Cge : Jo G calls: Baxter sups. Milesian, p. 50.

6. Sa. Mandeville, p. 101. Write to Constable . Milesian, p. 228. Vol. II, p. 68. Owen calls: call on
R Taylor
&
H G . adv. P G
.
Sep. 7. Su. Mandeville, p. 103/2. Three Embassies, p. 106: Milesian, p. 218. Miss Collins dines: walk w. Rosser .

8. M. Mandeville, p. 104/2. Three Embassies, p. 290: Milesian, Vol. III. Letter from Blois : call on R Taylor
: Kenney calls.
9. Tu. Mandeville, p. 105/2. Embassies, p. 390: Milesian, Vol., IV, p. 113. Write to Shelley . Hunter, Sen. Am., calls.

10. W. Mandeville, p. 106. Milesian, p. 204, fin. Call on Hazlit
n : Hazlit calls, & Paterson na .

11. Th. Mandeville, p. 107. Write to Curtis . Call on H Payne
&
J Taylor
: theatre, Wild Oats, acts 1 & 2:
W Curran sups. Laycock & Mason (booksellers) fined.

12. F. Mandeville, p. 108. Homme de Qualité, T. I. Call on Hayward
: theatre, Belle’s Stratagem, acts 1 & 2; adv. Ryan, Wallace, O’Brien (Perry, Jer. Taylor & Skeff ). Ethwald, acts 1 & 2.
13. Sa. Mandeville, p. 109. Homme de Qé, T. II, p. 100. Paterson calls na .

Sep. 14. Su. Mandeville, p. 111. Homme de Qe, p. 305. Call on Paterson
.
15. M. Mandeville, p. 113/2. Write to Shelley & P H G . Hazlit calls n .
16. Tu. Mandeville, p. 114/2. Homme de Qe, T. III, p. 54. H White , Lamb , Ballantine & Paterson call.

17. W. Mandeville, p. 115. Homme de Qe, p. 88. Wall & G Young call: call on Hayward
, &, w. M J, on Kenney
n .

18. Th. Mandeville, p. 117/2. Write to Taylor, Norwich
: Botwright & Wall call.

19. F. Mandeville, p. 119/2. Write to Constable & Shelley . Homme de Qe, p. 156. Call on Northcote
&
Jas Moore
: Rosser au soir.

20. Sa. Mandeville, p. 120. Write to Shelley . Homme de Qe, p. 184. Call on Jo G
: Hazlit calls: sup at
Wolcot’s , w. J Taylor .

Sep. 21. Su. Mandeville, p. 122/2. Homme de Qe, p. 232. Hazlit dines; invité Kenney
.

22. M. Mandeville, p. 122. Homme de Qe, Tom. IV. Museum : call on Northcote
n, w. Hazlit : miss Collins dines: call on
H G
.

23. Tu. Mandeville, p. 124. Buccaneers, çala. Call on Goodbehere
&
Jo G
. Write to Shelley . met Edw. Wt .
24. W. Mandeville, p. 126/2. Buccaneers, çala: Jo G calls.

25. Th. Mandeville, p. 128/2. Buccaneers, çala. Call on H G
: Shelley dines; adv. W Curran
: Botwright calls.

26. F. Mandeville, p. 129. Buccaneers, çala. Call on Lamb ; adv. Kenney
. Giddiness.
27. Sa. Mandeville, p. 130. Gold, pp. 56. Rosser au soir. W at home, 3 nights.

Sep. 28. Su. Mandeville, p. 132/2. W Curran dines. Call on G Young
n .
29. M. Mandeville, p. 132. Seek Briton : Museum, Lysons : Shelley dines.

30. Tu. Mandeville, p. 134. Send to Brayley : call on H G
: seek Davison : dine at Curran’s , w. Duncan : meet Jas Moore .

Oct. 1. W. Mandeville, p. 137/2, fin. Call on Davison
: Shelley dines:
Rodd’s
. Write to Constable & P H G . adv. Fk .
2. Th. Mandeville, revise. Write to H G . Kenney , M & Shelley call: walk w. Shelley : Jo G calls: theatre, Revenge (Maywood).
3. F. Mandeville, revise. N G calls: seek Hume : meet Kenney & Terry : Kenney dines: Macmillan & W Curran call.
4. Sa. Mandeville, revise. Write to Constable . Jo G calls.
Oct. 5. Su. Mandeville, revise. Lubé calls: 2 Merveilleux dine.

6. M. Mandeville, 2 pp. Call on Hume
: dine at Currans , w. Lubé : theatre, Frederic the Great.

7. Tu. Mandeville, 2 pp. Call on Jo G
&
Davison
: Shelley dines: Rosser calls na .

8. W. Mandeville, 2 pp. Du Bellay, çala. Jo G calls: seek Davison .
H Erskine dies .

9. Th. Mandeville, revise. Call on Davison
: J B Curran calls:
Brompton ; adv. Burton, Tegart & mrs Rd C
: Shelley & miss Collins dine: W Curran calls: Baxter & Rosser sup. Homersham calls.

10. F. Mandeville, revise. Burton calls:
Brompton ; adv. Taylors & mrs Rd C
: meet C Phillips : Homersham calls.

11. Sa. Mandeville, revise. Write to Constable : Burton calls: meet Lamb :
Brompton ; adv. Phillips, W & J B Curran, Tegart, & mrs Rd C
.

Oct. 12. Su. Mandeville, revise.
Brompton ; adv. Ainslie, Baddome, Tegart, & J B & W Curran
.
13. M. Mandeville, revise. Frankenstein, Vol. I., Shelley at tea.

14. Tu. Mandeville, revise. Burton , Macmillan & M call: Shelley dines:
Brompton (Death), present W & J B Curran, mrs R C, Taylors, mrs D, & Rd
.
Curran dies.

15. W. Curran, 2 1/2 pp. Call on Phillips & Northcote :
Brompton , meet Burton, Phillips, Lyne, Tegart, J B & W Curran, mrs R C, & Taylors
: Shelley dines.

16. Th. Write to Jeffray & Constable . Burton , N G & M call: Shelley dines:
Rodd’s
.
17. F. Mandeville, revise: Hints for Preface.
18. Sa. Mandeville, revise; Preface, 2 pp. M calls: Shelley at tea: Macmillan calls.

Oct. 19. M.
Gig w. Shelley: bait at Colnebrooke: walk to Horton: Marlow, dine; Peacock sups.
20. M. Gig w. Mary; attendant Shelley & Peacock; through Wycombe, to Hampden . Write to M J . Fitzgerald calls n .
21. Tu. Moore, Epistles, çala. Walk to Bisham, w. Shelley & Peacock : talk w. Jane . Reeves & Jas Smith call n , & Fitzgerald n .

23. W.
Stage, w. Shelley, to London : call on Mrs Dixon
,
Taylor
, Lyne (Phillips n ), &
Fitzgerald
n : Shelley dines: M & Jo G call . Write to Fitzgerald & Constable . Meet W Curran .

23. Th. Write to Curtis . Fitzgerald , & Taylor na call: Shelley dines; adv. W Curran
: Shelley sleeps.
24. F. Write to Deacon & Jane . Fitzgerald calls: Botwright au soir.
25. Sa. Write to Jeffray . Last proofs. Fitzgerald & Botwright call: 2 Merveilleux dine.

Oct. 26. Su. Last proofs. Write to Constable . W Curran dines:
Betterton’s au soir, w. Jo G, & Smith artist ; Wooler parti : rev. Taylor & Rosser call.

27. M. Jonson, çala. Lamb calls, & Mulready n : seek Davison : Fitzgerald dines; invité Phillips
.

28. Tu. Write to Franks, Dublin
. Staple of News, çala. Call on Davison
: Phillips , Fitzgerald , W Curran & Ryan call: miss Collins, 2 nights: Rosser sups.

29. W. Staple of News, acts 1 & 2. Call on Davison
,
Hume
&
Jo G
:
Rodd’s
. Booth & Young call.

30. Th. Write to Taylor (Norwich)
& Shelley . Staple of News, act 3. Fitzgerald calls: W Curran sups. Mulready calls.
31. F. Write to William . Hazlit, on Malthus, p. 80: Staple of News, act 4. Rosser calls: W Curran sups.

Nov. 1. Sa. Hazlit, p. 160. M breakfasts: call on
Lamb
: Othello (theatre), act 1. Fitzgerald calls.

Nov. 2. Su. Hazlit, p. 276. Call on Place
: Shelley sleeps, 6 nights.
3. M. Notes. R Taylor , Botwright , W Curran & Fitzgerald call.

4. Tu.
Curran’s Funeral, w. 2 Taylors, 2 Currans, Tegart, Moore, Thomson, Phillips, Lyne, Croley & Finnerty; (adv. Fitzgerald & Ryan :)
Botwright & Booth call.
5. W. Hazlit, p. 332. Moore, broker : Hayward calls. Atheist’s Tragedy, acts 1 & 2. Dr Curry calls (on S): July 9.

6. Th.
Jo G , Longdill , Northcote & W Curran & M call: Mulready & W Curran dine: H Robinson au soir.
L Hunt calls .
Princess Charlotte dies .

8. Sa.
Jo G calls: call on
Hayward
&
Butterfield
: Mary dines: meet Edw. Taylor : sup at Lamb’s , w. M J & Field .

Nov. 9. Su. Call on Shelley, Mabledon Place ; adv. L[?] Ht
.

10. M.
Lamb , Shelley , Hayward n & Edw. Taylor call: call on Longdill twice: tea Shelley’s , w. Ollier : sup at S E’s , w. Leserve & M J .

11. Tu. Sepulchres, pp. 116. Shelley , Mackintosh & Longdill call: call on Hayward
,
Longdill
&
Shelley
. Wall calls.

12. W. Hazlit, p. 378, fin. Longdill , & Mes Dixon & Darley call:
Rodd’s
.

13. Th. William Hacket, çala. Constable & Shelley call: dine at
Shelley’s ; adv. Curry, Baxter & Booth
. Write to Jane .
14. F. Zapolya, pp. 128. Constable n & Shelley call: Constable & Thompson sup.

15. Sa. Life of Whitgift, pp. 124. Hazlit calls: dine at
Shelley’s , w. M J : call on Wolcot , w. Shelley; adv. Taylor
. Call on Longdill
.

Nov. 16. Su. Call on Evans
,
B Allen
n , &
Aldis
: Shelleys dine.

17. M. Atheist’s Tragedy, fin. Shelley calls: dine at
Aldis’s , w. 3 Brownings, 2 Hickses, Wageman, Powis & Acton; adv. Barber
.

18. Tu. Theatralia, pp. 15. Call on Constable
n &
Dixon
: dine at Shelley’s , w. M J; adv. L Hunt & Keates
.

19. W. Chaucer, Tales, p. 8. Call on Hayward
: Constable dines; adv. Shelley
: Shelley & Rosser sup.

20. Th. Chaucer, p. 28. Call on Constable
: Constable calls: Shelley dines. M calls.
21. F. Chaucer, p. 35; Pardoner, pp. 28. Botwright calls: Shelley & Jane dine.

22. Sa. Chaucer, Miller, pp. 32.
S & J dine & sup. Frankenstein, Vol. III., p. 115.

Nov. 23. Su. Chaucer, Reve, pp. 19; Manciple, pp. 11: Fairfax, p. 6. Booth calls: Booth & J dine; adv. S & Baxter
.
24. M. Chaucer, Shipman, pp. 19: Frankenstein, p. 192, fin. Constable calls: S & J dine: Rodd’s; adv. Heber .

25. Tu. Wife of Bath, p. 16. Booth breakfasts: dine at
S E’s , w M J & Leserve .

26. W. Malthus, 1st Edition, çala.
Theatre, Isabella.

27. Th. Malthus, çala: Wife of Bath, p. 49: Cordila, pp. 8. Booth calls: call on Constable ; adv. O. Rees
.

28. F. Malthus, çala: Staple of News, act 5. M calls: call on
Longdil
, & on
S E ; adv. Leserve & Pinkard
: Botwright au soir.

29. Sa.
Subscription. Malthus, çala. Call on Constable
n : Constable calls twice n , Jo G & Ravenscroft : call on Walker
&
Biscoe
: Bevan calls: M Burney sups.
Nov. 30. Su. Malthus, çala. Mandeville, Vol. I.

Dec. 1. M. Mandeville, Vol. II. M & Walker & Ravenscroft call: call on
Hayward
,
Richardson
&
Constable
. Mandeville published .

2. Tu. Mandeville, Vol. III, p. 150. N G & Ravenscroft call: call on
Hayward
: Botwright at tea: meet Hazlit .

3. W. Mandeville, fin. Call on Iveson
, &
M Lamb ; adv. L Martin
: Booth calls n : Lambs sup.

4. Th. Write to Evans , &
Taylor, Norwich
. Call on Richardson
n &
Hayward
:
Rodd’s
. & on Biscoe
.

5. F. Laon, C. II, III. Constable calls: call on Booth
: theatre, 2/5 Richard (Fisher), & Husbands & Wives; adv. Hazlit, Fuseli & Knowles
. mrs Napier dines.

6. Sa. Write to Shelley . Call on Richardson
: Constable calls na .

Dec. 7. Su. Devil is an Ass. Call on Constable ; adv. D C
: Rosser at tea.

8. M. Call on Inchbald
: Booth dines; adv. Baxter
.

9. Tu. Malthus, çala. Call on Longman
n (O Rees) &
Constable
: M (from Richardson ) & F Walsh n call: D Constable & Bevan sup. Write to Shelley . Call on Yng
n .

10. W. Write to Shelley . Juventus, pp. 43. Call on
Inchbald , w. Constable . Fk calls.

11. Th. Malthus, çala. Write to Curtis . M & Owen call.
Rodd’s
.

12. F. Malthus, çala. Bertram calls: call on
Constable
n : Fk dines, &c: theatre, 1/4 Lilliput.

13. Sa. Malthus, çala. Call on Simpkin
&
Constable
: Bevan calls n : theatre, Outwitted at Last; adv. Perry
. Letter from Evans .

Dec. 14. Su. Population, p. 3/2. Write to Place . Constable calls: Bevan sups. Call on
Hayward ; adv. Watson of the Stuart Papers
.
15. M. Giddiness. Write to Shelley . Bartram , M , Richardson & Botwright call. Letter fm Swartwout .

16. Tu. Write to Constable & Thos Cooper : call on Biscoe
&
Northcote
: Constable , Hazlit , Booth & Baxter call; adv. Fairley na
. William at home.

17. W. Write to Shelley . Botwright & Jo G call: Bevan & Fairley dine: call on Constable
.

18. Th. Write to Shelley . Jo G & Botwright call, & Mure : My & Car. Colnets dine:
theatre, Riches; adv. Lamb & Telford
. M calls.
Keats
.
Hone, three trials, Dec. 18, 19, 20.

19. F. Call on Bryan
&
Reed, Law Stationers
.

20. Sa. Call on Pike
&
Hayward
: coach to Marlow.
Dec. 21. Su. Rimini, pp. 110. Peacock sups. Constable calls n : Lambs sup n . H Ht. three nights.

22. M. Coach to London:
Mure calls: call on Constable ; adv. D Booth
: theatre, Henry VI; adv. B Montagu & Lawrence
.

23. Tu. Write to E Inchbald . Fairley at tea:
Rodd’s
.

24. W. Write to Shelley . Wardmote: call on
Longm
n &
Evans
: meet Lackington : mrs Cooper & E Colfins dine; adv. Booth
: call on Constable ; adv. Wallace, Booth & Wheatley
: sup at Botwright’s
. M calls. Call on
Hone
n .
sleeps 14 nights .

25. Th. Letter to Demonville . Call on S E
: meet Keats : Fairley dines.

26. F. Write to Demonville . Meet Hone
& Keats: Fk , Weale & W Gordon call: call at Judd Place : Wordsworth calls n : C C dines. Mrs Elwes dies .

27. Sa. Write to Shelley .
M
&
Mure call: call on Wolcot
, & (w. M J) Leserve ; adv. Cordy
. Intended visit to Marlow, w. M J & W .
Hannah Godwin dies .

Dec. 28. Su. Call on Place
na &
Constable
n , & on Leserve , for M J ; adv. Cordy
. Charles Dr
Burney dies .

29. M. Heywood’s Eliz., pp. 186. S Reeves & N G call: call on
Place
n &
Constable
:
Leserve , w. W, for M J ; adv. Cordy
: H Robinson sups. Write to Shelley .

30. Tu. Population, 1 page. Write to P H G . Jo & N G call: call on
Place
:
Rodd’s
.
31. W. Population, 1/2 page. Hume & Botwright call: theatre, 1/2 Falls of the Clyde: Fairley sups. Constable calls: H Robinson at tea.
